Lead Id.description: Unique identifier for the lead. When users ask a question regarding the count of leads you should count this column

Is Blend Lead.description: A binary value indicating whether or not the lead was generated using the Blend application flow. A value of 1 means that the lead was generated through Blend

Created Date.description: Date and time when the lead was created

Loan Officer Name.description: Name of the loan officer or group associated with the lead

Branch Code.description: Code representing which Branch the lead belongs to

Currently Renting.description: Indicator for whether the borrower is currently renting

Desired Loan Amount.description: Desired loan amount by the lead

Desired Rate Type.description: Type of desired interest rate (e.g., Fixed)

Desired Loan Term.description: Desired term of the loan in months

DTI Decision.description: Qualification Decision related to Debt-to-Income ratio (e.g. accepted, denied)

Existing Mortgage Balance.description: Balance of existing mortgage if one exists

Existing Mortgage Monthly Payment.description: Monthly payment of existing mortgage if one exists

Existing Rate Type.description: Type of interest rate of existing mortgage if one exists

First Time Home Buyer.description: Indicator for whether the lead is a first-time home buyer

Has Bankruptcy.description: Indicator for whether the lead has a bankruptcy history

Has Foreclosure.description: Indicator for whether the lead has a foreclosure history

Intended Property Use.description: Intended use of the property (e.g., Purchase)

Desired Loan Purpose.description: Purpose of the desired loan (e.g., Purchase)

Needs Realtor.description: Indicator for whether the lead needs a realtor

New Home Value.description: Value of the new home (i.e. the subject property)

Property State.description: State where the property is located

Property City.description: City where the property is located

Referral Source Details.description: Name of the leads referral source

UTM Campaign.description: The name of the PPC campaign used to generate the lead

UTM Medium.description: The medium of the PPC campaign used to generate the lead

UTM Source.description: The source of the PPC campaign used to generate the lead

UTM Term.description: The keyword of the PPC campaign used to generate the lead
